General.Name: Livanis Publications SA
General.Description: Livanis Publications SA operates as a publishing company in Lebanon. The company engages in publishing books and related forms; printing and bookbinding; and leases magazines, as well as provides administrative and advertising services. It is also involved in sale of paper, and trading of books and related items. Livanis Publications SA was founded in 1972 and is based in Athens, Greece.
